readable.title: 3462165890_c13ce13eff
readable.content: A girl with a white backpack is standing and smaller children are sitting in a row on the ground . A lady stands on the street , surrounded by school children . a woman in blue jeans is standing in front of a group of children beside a stone built house . Group of children and some adults gathered outside stone buildings . Many children and some parents are waiting near a decorated castle .
